job.title: .NET Architect for Code Analysis
job.description:
We are seeking an experienced .NET developer with a strong background in code analysis, optimization, and security review to conduct a thorough examination of our existing .NET application. 

Project Scope:
Objective: The main goal is to conduct a detailed analysis of our .NET code base to identify performance bottlenecks, security vulnerabilities, areas for refactoring, and to prepare for potential technology upgrades.
Project Background: Our application is built on the .NET Framework, incorporating ASP.NET MVC and Entity Framework. Required Skills and Experience:
Proficiency in .NET technologies, specifically experience with .NET Framework, .NET Core, ASP.NET MVC, and Entity Framework.
Strong understanding of software architecture, design patterns, and best practices.
Experience in conducting code reviews and analysis with a focus on performance optimization and security.
Familiarity with SQL Server is required
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Deliverables:
A comprehensive analysis of the code base, to be discussed over several meetings. 

To be considered for this project, please submit the following:

A brief introduction highlighting your experience with .NET technologies and code analysis projects as an architect.
Your availability to start and estimated time to complete the analysis.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a highly skilled .NET Specialist for Code Analysis to join our team for a short-term project of less than 1 month. As the ideal candidate, you should have a solid understanding of HTML, SQL, .NET Framework, ASP.NET, Microsoft SQL Server, JavaScript, C#, and ASP.NET MVC.

Your main responsibility will be to analyze and optimize existing codebase, identifying and fixing any performance, security, or scalability issues. This includes conducting thorough code reviews, implementing best practices, and ensuring code quality.

To apply for this role, please submit a proposal outlining your experience and how you can contribute to the project. Additionally, please include links to any relevant past completed projects that showcase your skills in code analysis and optimization.

We look forward to reviewing your application and discussing this exciting opportunity further.
customFields.finalDescriptionAI:
We are seeking an experienced .NET developer with a strong background in code analysis, optimization, and security review to conduct a thorough examination of our existing .NET application. Project Scope:
Objective: The main goal is to conduct a detailed analysis of our .NET code base to identify performance bottlenecks, security vulnerabilities, areas for refactoring, and to prepare for potential technology upgrades.
Project Background: Our application is built on the .NET Framework, incorporating ASP.NET MVC and Entity Framework. Required Skills and Experience:
Proficiency in .NET technologies, specifically experience with .NET Framework, .NET Core, ASP.NET MVC, and Entity Framework.
Strong understanding of software architecture, design patterns, and best practices.
Experience in conducting code reviews and analysis with a focus on performance optimization and security.
Familiarity with SQL Server is required
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Deliverables:
A comprehensive analysis of the code base, to be discussed over several meetings. 

To be considered for this project, please submit the following:

A brief introduction highlighting your experience with .NET technologies and code analysis projects as an architect.
Your availability to start and estimated time to complete the analysis.
